column1: Click on Accept Cookies if prompted
Enter email hubspot_email and click Next
Enter password hubspot_password and click Login
If prompted for a verification code enter 111111 and click next/submit
If you see any popup, close it.
Click on CRM from the left panel then click on Contacts
Verify that there are two contacts in the list
Click on CRM from the left panel then click on Companies
Verify that there are two contacts in the list
